analyzed: ba na bud med kyi 'du shes kyi dbang du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: he does not come under the influence of the idea of a woman.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: dran pa nye bar gnas pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gnas pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because mindfulness is present.

original: 'di ni dran pa dang 'brel ba dang po yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni dran pa dang 'brel ba dang po yin no //
translated: This is the first connection with mindfulness.

original: gzhan yang / dran pa dang 'brel pa ni phyi rol gyi tshal nyams dga' ba dang / chu bo nyams dga' ba dang / lteng ka nyams dga' ba dang / skyed mos tshal nyams dga' ba rnams mthong nas kyang 'di ltar dran pa nye bar 'jog ste /
analyzed: gzhan yang / dran pa dang 'brel pa ni phyi rol gyi tshal nyams dga' ba dang / chu bo nyams dga' ba dang / lteng ka nyams dga' ba dang / skyed mos tshal nyams dga' ba rnams mthong nas kyang 'di ltar dran pa nye bar 'jog ste /
translated: Moreover, when he sees pleasant groves, pleasant rivers, pleasant ponds, and pleasant parks outside, he establishes mindfulness in this way:

original: nyams dga' ba'i ngo bo gang yin pa de dag gis dus ni phyis 'byung ste /
analyzed: nyams dga' ba'i ngo bo gang yin pa de dag gis dus ni phyis 'byung ste /
translated: “Whatever is the essence of what is pleasant, that will arise later.

original: byis pa'i sems rab tu chags par byed pa de dag ni rnyi rnyi por 'gyur /
analyzed: byis pa'i sems rab tu chags par byed pa de dag ni rnyi rnyi por 'gyur /
translated: Those things that cause the mind of a child to be attached will become dry,

original: lhags par 'gyur /
analyzed: lhags par 'gyur /
translated: will become withered,

original: mi sdug par 'gyur /
analyzed: mi sdug par 'gyur /
translated: will become ugly,

original: 'dab ma rnyis shing lo ma sil sil por lhags par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dab ma rnyis shing lo ma sil sil por lhags par 'gyur ro //
translated: and the leaves will become dry and fall off.”

original: de dag de ltar gyur kyis kyang thams cad du 'byung bar mi 'gyur la /
analyzed: de dag de ltar gyur kyis kyang thams cad du 'byung bar mi 'gyur la /
translated: Even though they have become like that, they do not occur everywhere.

original: kye ma / 'di dag la nyams dga' ba ci zhig yod snyam ste /
analyzed: kye ma / 'di dag la nyams dga' ba ci zhig yod snyam ste /
translated: “Alas, what is there to enjoy in these?”

original: de ltar dran pa dang 'brel bar byed do //
analyzed: de ltar dran pa dang 'brel bar byed do //
translated: Thus, he is connected with mindfulness.

original: de ltar dran pa nye bar gnas pa brgam pa med pa de ni phyi nang gi yul gyi gzugs kyis nyams pa med cing bdud kyis kyang gnod pa med do //
analyzed: de ltar dran pa nye bar gnas pa brgam pa med pa de ni phyi nang gi yul gyi gzugs kyis nyams pa med cing bdud kyis kyang gnod pa med do //
translated: Thus, he who has established mindfulness without delay is not harmed by the forms of external and internal objects, and Māra cannot harm him.

original: gzhan yang de'i don dang / phan par bya ba'i phyir dran pa dang 'brel pa gsum pa de dran par byed do //
analyzed: gzhan yang de'i don dang / phan par bya ba'i phyir dran pa dang 'brel pa gsum pa de dran par byed do //
translated: Moreover, for the sake of his purpose and benefit, he is mindful of the third connection.

original: ji ltar dran par byed /
analyzed: ji ltar dran par byed /
translated: How is he mindful?

original: dran pa dang 'brel pa'i dmigs pa ni gang yin zhe na /🔽'dis sngon zos pa'am /🔽nyal ba'am / dga' bar byas pa'am /
analyzed: dran pa dang 'brel pa'i dmigs pa ni gang yin zhe na / 'dis sngon zos pa'am / nyal ba'am / dga' bar byas pa'am /
translated: What is the object of mindfulness?🔽He does not remember or think about what he has previously eaten,🔽slept, enjoyed,

original: @383b dmigs pa bsten pa gang yin pa de dag dran nas rtog par mi byed cing yid la dam du 'dzin par mi byed de /
analyzed: @383b dmigs pa bsten pa gang yin pa de dag dran nas rtog par mi byed cing yid la dam du 'dzin par mi byed de /
translated: or what he has previously relied on as an object of meditation.

original: de ltar de byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi dbang po dag ni tshim pa med do snyam ste /
analyzed: de ltar de byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi dbang po dag ni tshim pa med do snyam ste /
translated: Thus, the faculties of childish ordinary beings are never satisfied.

original: de ltar dran pa dang 'brel par byed do //
analyzed: de ltar dran pa dang 'brel par byed do //
translated: In this way, he is connected with mindfulness.

original: gzhan yang / dran pa dang 'brel pa bzhi pa dran par byed de /
analyzed: gzhan yang / dran pa dang 'brel pa bzhi pa dran par byed de /
translated: Moreover, he is connected with the fourth mindfulness, which is as follows.

original: gang du rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / mal stan dang / na ba'i gsos sman gyi rkyen gyi yo byad rab tu mang po thob pa der dga' ba dang 'brel bar mi byed cing kun tu chags par mi byed do //
analyzed: gang du rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / mal stan dang / na ba'i gsos sman gyi rkyen gyi yo byad rab tu mang po thob pa der dga' ba dang 'brel bar mi byed cing kun tu chags par mi byed do //
translated: Wherever he obtains abundant requisites for the conditions of gain, honor, bedding, seats, and medicine for sickness, he does not become attached or cling to that.

original: 'di ltar rnyed pa dang / bkur sti lhur byed pas dge sbyong nyams par 'gyur la /
analyzed: 'di ltar rnyed pa dang / bkur sti lhur byed pas dge sbyong nyams par 'gyur la /
translated: Because one who is devoted to gain and honor will degenerate in the training of a monk.

original: gang zag de'ang pags pa ral nas sha ral bar 'gyur /🔽sha ral nas chu rgyus chad par 'gyur /🔽chu rgyus chad nas rus pa chag par 'gyur /
analyzed: gang zag de'ang pags pa ral nas sha ral bar 'gyur / sha ral nas chu rgyus chad par 'gyur / chu rgyus chad nas rus pa chag par 'gyur /
translated: For that person, the skin will be torn, the flesh will be torn.🔽When the flesh is torn, the sinews will be severed.🔽When the sinews are severed, the bones will be shattered.

original: rus pa chag nas rkang yang zad par 'gyur te /
analyzed: rus pa chag nas rkang yang zad par 'gyur te /
translated: When the bones are shattered, the marrow will be exhausted.

original: rnyed pa dang / bkur stis ni de ltar byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnyed pa dang / bkur stis ni de ltar byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: Gain and honor will cause that to happen.

original: rnyed pa dang / bkur sti 'di ni dge ba'i chos thams cad kyi bar chad byed pa'i rgyu yin te /
analyzed: rnyed pa dang / bkur sti 'di ni dge ba'i chos thams cad kyi bar chad byed pa'i rgyu yin te /
translated: “This gain and honor is the cause of an obstacle to all good qualities.

original: legs par dran pa nye bar gnas pa ni phyogs gcig la gnas pa yin no //
analyzed: legs par dran pa nye bar gnas pa ni phyogs gcig la gnas pa yin no //
translated: One who is well established in mindfulness is one who abides in a single place.

original: gzhan yang / dran pa dang 'brel pa lnga pa dran par byed do //
analyzed: gzhan yang / dran pa dang 'brel pa lnga pa dran par byed do //
translated: “Moreover, the fifth is the mindfulness that is connected with the five.

original: grong dang / grong khyer dang / ljongs su rab tu rgyu bar mi byed /
analyzed: grong dang / grong khyer dang / ljongs su rab tu rgyu bar mi byed /
translated: One does not wander in the villages, towns, and countries.

original: grong khyer dag la bsten par mi byed /
analyzed: grong khyer dag la bsten par mi byed /
translated: One does not rely on the towns.

original: yul mi dag dang 'brel pa'i gtam smra ba'i ngo bor mi byed /
analyzed: yul mi dag dang 'brel pa'i gtam smra ba'i ngo bor mi byed /
translated: One does not engage in conversation with the people of the land.

original: 'du 'dzi dang dga' bar gnas par mi byed do //🔽'di ltar grong dang / grong @384a *//
analyzed: 'du 'dzi dang dga' bar gnas par mi byed do // 'di ltar grong dang / grong @384a *//
translated: One does not engage in frivolous pursuits and enjoyments.

original: khyer dang / ljongs su gnas par byed pa gang yin pa de dag ni blo g-yengs par 'gyur la /
analyzed: khyer dang / ljongs su gnas par byed pa gang yin pa de dag ni blo g-yengs par 'gyur la /
translated: In this way, those who dwell in the villages, towns, and countries become distracted.

original: rang gi don kyang byed bar mi nus so //
analyzed: rang gi don kyang byed bar mi nus so //
translated: They are unable to accomplish their own goals.

original: de ltar de dag gi don ji lta ba bzhin mthong ba nyid kyis dran pa skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar de dag gi don ji lta ba bzhin mthong ba nyid kyis dran pa skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: In this way, mindfulness arises through seeing things as they really are.🔽“

original: gzhan yang / dran pa dang 'brel pa drug pa dran par byed de /
analyzed: gzhan yang / dran pa dang 'brel pa drug pa dran par byed de /
translated: the sixth related to recollection is to be mindful of this.

original: de ltar skyon du lta ba de ni dur khrod dang / shing drung dang / sog khrod dang / ri'i gsab gseb dang / khang stong du bsten par byed cing su dang yang lhan cig gnas par mi byed /
analyzed: de ltar skyon du lta ba de ni dur khrod dang / shing drung dang / sog khrod dang / ri'i gsab gseb dang / khang stong du bsten par byed cing su dang yang lhan cig gnas par mi byed /
translated: “In this way, one who views faults in this way will rely on charnel grounds, the foot of trees, haystacks, mountain caves, and empty houses, and will not live with anyone.

original: 'dre bar mi byed do //
analyzed: 'dre bar mi byed do //
translated: One will not associate with anyone.

original: 'di ltar 'dre bar mi byed pa'i dge slong de ni dge ba'i chos rnams thob par 'gyur la /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'dre bar mi byed pa'i dge slong de ni dge ba'i chos rnams thob par 'gyur la /
translated: In this way, a monk who does not associate with anyone will attain virtuous qualities.

original: spang bar bya ba'ang spong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: spang bar bya ba'ang spong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: And what is to be abandoned will be abandoned.

original: gzhan yang dran pa dang 'brel pa bdun pa dran par byed de /🔽lha'i gtam rnams la'ang chags pa mi skyed la /
analyzed: gzhan yang dran pa dang 'brel pa bdun pa dran par byed de / lha'i gtam rnams la'ang chags pa mi skyed la /
translated: Moreover, the seventh related to recollection is to be mindful of this.🔽One will not give rise to attachment even to divine talk.

original: sems can dmyal ba'i gtam rnams la'ang yid 'byung bar mi byed do //
analyzed: sems can dmyal ba'i gtam rnams la'ang yid 'byung bar mi byed do //
translated: One will not become disenchanted even by talk of the hells.

original: de 'di snyam du dran par byed de /
analyzed: de 'di snyam du dran par byed de /
translated: One will be mindful of this:

original: lha rnams kyi mtha' ni ltung zhing gnod pa dang bcas la gshin rje'i mi'i dbang du gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: lha rnams kyi mtha' ni ltung zhing gnod pa dang bcas la gshin rje'i mi'i dbang du gyur pa yin no //
translated: ‘The end of the gods is to fall, and they are subject to harm and the control of the Lord of Death.’

original: sems can dmyal ba pa'ang las kyis drangs pa yin te /
analyzed: sems can dmyal ba pa'ang las kyis drangs pa yin te /
translated: “ ‘The beings in the hells are also led by their karma.

original: rjes su dga' bar mi bya zhing gzhan byed pa'ang phyir bzlog par bya'o snyam ste /
analyzed: rjes su dga' bar mi bya zhing gzhan byed pa'ang phyir bzlog par bya'o snyam ste /
translated: I will not rejoice in this, and I will turn others away from it.🔽’

original: de mtho ris la'ang mi dga'/
analyzed: de mtho ris la'ang mi dga'/
translated: “ ‘I do not delight in the higher realms,

original: sems can dmyal ba la'ang 'jigs pa med de /
analyzed: sems can dmyal ba la'ang 'jigs pa med de /
translated: and I am not afraid of the hells.🔽’

original: dga' ba dang / 'jigs pa spangs pa de ni dge ba dran pa'i ngo @384b bor 'gyur te /
analyzed: dga' ba dang / 'jigs pa spangs pa de ni dge ba dran pa'i ngo @384b bor 'gyur te /
translated: “ ‘Abandoning delight and fear, he becomes mindful of virtue.

original: dran pa nye bar gnas pa yin no //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gnas pa yin no //
translated: He is established in mindfulness.

original: gzhan yang / dran pa dang 'brel pa brgyad pa dran par byed de /
analyzed: gzhan yang / dran pa dang 'brel pa brgyad pa dran par byed de /
translated: “ ‘He is mindful of eight things related to mindfulness:

original: bdag gi dran pa nye bar gnas pa ni legs pa yin te /
analyzed: bdag gi dran pa nye bar gnas pa ni legs pa yin te /
translated: “It is good that my mindfulness is present.

original: mi dge ba'i chos snang ba rnams nyams shing zad la bcom zhing spangs par gyur to //
analyzed: mi dge ba'i chos snang ba rnams nyams shing zad la bcom zhing spangs par gyur to //
translated: The unvirtuous phenomena that manifest have been diminished, exhausted, destroyed, and abandoned.

original: gzhan yang / yid la mi dge pa skyes pa des /
analyzed: gzhan yang / yid la mi dge pa skyes pa des /
translated: “ ‘Moreover, when unvirtuous thoughts arise,

original: bdag gi dge pa dran pa nyams shing bdag gi kun nas bar chad byung ste /
analyzed: bdag gi dge pa dran pa nyams shing bdag gi kun nas bar chad byung ste /
translated: they diminish my virtuous mindfulness and create obstacles for me.

original: de la bdag gis yang dge ba'i dran pa nyid bskyed par bya'o snyam nas /
analyzed: de la bdag gis yang dge ba'i dran pa nyid bskyed par bya'o snyam nas /
translated: I will therefore generate virtuous mindfulness.

original: de ltar dmigs pa dang / mtshan nyid dran pa de gcig nas gcig tu 'grang bar byed do //
analyzed: de ltar dmigs pa dang / mtshan nyid dran pa de gcig nas gcig tu 'grang bar byed do //
translated: In this way, mindfulness of the object and the characteristics is passed on from one to the next.

original: yid la gcig tu gyur cing gcig tu 'dus pa ni dran pa las su rung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yid la gcig tu gyur cing gcig tu 'dus pa ni dran pa las su rung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: When the mind becomes one-pointed and unified, mindfulness becomes workable.

original: de ni chu bo'i shugs kyi rlabs mi brtan pa /
analyzed: de ni chu bo'i shugs kyi rlabs mi brtan pa /
translated: It is like the waves of a river, which are unstable.

original: yul nor ba ngag lta bu dag las sems 'dzin par nus so; ;gzhan yang /
analyzed: yul nor ba ngag lta bu dag las sems 'dzin par nus so; ;gzhan yang /
translated: One is able to hold the mind away from mistaken objects and views.

original: dran pa dang 'brel pa dgu pa dran par byed de /
analyzed: dran pa dang 'brel pa dgu pa dran par byed de /
translated: Moreover, one should be mindful of the nine related things:

original: nyin gcig bzhin sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rjes su dran par byed /
analyzed: nyin gcig bzhin sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rjes su dran par byed /
translated: One should be mindful of the qualities of the Buddha every day.

original: dam pa'i chos la rtag tu gus par byed /
analyzed: dam pa'i chos la rtag tu gus par byed /
translated: One should always respect the sublime Dharma.

original: bla ma rnams la dad par byed cing de'i bsgrub pa la'ang gnas par byed /
analyzed: bla ma rnams la dad par byed cing de'i bsgrub pa la'ang gnas par byed /
translated: One should have faith in the gurus and abide by their instructions.

original: blo shin tu mnyam par gzhog par byed /
analyzed: blo shin tu mnyam par gzhog par byed /
translated: One should be very concentrated.

original: gnya' shing gang tsam du lta bar byed /
analyzed: gnya' shing gang tsam du lta bar byed /
translated: One should look ahead only the length of a yoke.

original: sems can thams cad la phan par mos pa dran par byed de /
analyzed: sems can thams cad la phan par mos pa dran par byed de /
translated: One should be mindful of the aspiration to benefit all sentient beings.

original: de'i dran pa dang 'brel pa de ni 'bras bu dang bcas pa mtha' mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i dran pa dang 'brel pa de ni 'bras bu dang bcas pa mtha' mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ro //
translated: The connection with mindfulness is the result, which is the transcendence of suffering.

original: gzhan yang / dran pa dang 'brel pa bcu @385a *//
analyzed: gzhan yang / dran pa dang 'brel pa bcu @385a *//
translated: “Moreover, there are ten connections with mindfulness.

original: pa dran par byed de /🔽blo gros shin tu mnyam par gzhog par byed la /
analyzed: pa dran par byed de / blo gros shin tu mnyam par gzhog par byed la /
translated: One should be mindful of🔽the four great fears.

original: 'di ltar 'jigs pa chen po bzhi po 'di dag 'ong ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'jigs pa chen po bzhi po 'di dag 'ong ste /
translated: The four great fears are

original: rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / rgud pa dang / bzhi'o //
analyzed: rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / rgud pa dang / bzhi'o //
translated: aging, sickness, death, and decline.

original: de dgra chen po dag gis rtag tu rnam par 'jigs te /
analyzed: de dgra chen po dag gis rtag tu rnam par 'jigs te /
translated: One is always terrified of these great enemies,

original: dga' bar mi sems so //
analyzed: dga' bar mi sems so //
translated: and one’s mind is not at ease.

original: bzhi zhig kyang shin tu mi brtan par mthong ste /
analyzed: bzhi zhig kyang shin tu mi brtan par mthong ste /
translated: One also sees that the four are very unstable:

original: tshe dang / nad med pa dang / lang tsho dang / phun sum tshogs pa bzhi'o //
analyzed: tshe dang / nad med pa dang / lang tsho dang / phun sum tshogs pa bzhi'o //
translated: life, health, youth, and prosperity.

original: de sngar bstan pa bzhi po de dag la rtag tu 'jigs shing mi brtan pa gzhan yang goms par byed pa ni yul rnams kyis 'phrogs par mi 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: de sngar bstan pa bzhi po de dag la rtag tu 'jigs shing mi brtan pa gzhan yang goms par byed pa ni yul rnams kyis 'phrogs par mi 'gyur zhing /
translated: One is always terrified of these four previously mentioned unstable things, and one does not become accustomed to them. One is not carried away by objects.

original: dga' ba'i 'dod chags kyi dbang du mi 'gro la /
analyzed: dga' ba'i 'dod chags kyi dbang du mi 'gro la /
translated: He does not fall under the power of attachment to pleasure.

original: dran pa nye bar gnas par 'gyur te /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gnas par 'gyur te /
translated: He is mindful and

original: nyon mongs pa'i ri zad par nus so //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa'i ri zad par nus so //
translated: can destroy the mountain of afflictions.

original: gzhan yang / dran pa dang 'brel pa bcu gcig pa dran par byed de /
analyzed: gzhan yang / dran pa dang 'brel pa bcu gcig pa dran par byed de /
translated: “ ‘There is another eleventh point related to mindfulness:

original: dge 'dun la gang zag gis 'byed par mi byed pa /
analyzed: dge 'dun la gang zag gis 'byed par mi byed pa /
translated: One does not divide the Saṅgha into factions.

original: le lo la brtson zhing spyod par mi byed /
analyzed: le lo la brtson zhing spyod par mi byed /
translated: One does not engage in or strive for laziness.

original: gang zag gis gang zag rab tu 'byed par byed pa ni nyams par 'gyur bas /
analyzed: gang zag gis gang zag rab tu 'byed par byed pa ni nyams par 'gyur bas /
translated: One does not divide people into factions, for that would be a downfall.

original: gnod par mi byed la phan par yang mi byed pa de ni /
analyzed: gnod par mi byed la phan par yang mi byed pa de ni /
translated: One does not harm others, nor does one benefit them.

original: de ltar sems dang bar 'gyur zhing de'i dran pa yang las su rung bar 'gyur te; gnod pa med pa lhur len par byed do //
analyzed: de ltar sems dang bar 'gyur zhing de'i dran pa yang las su rung bar 'gyur te; gnod pa med pa lhur len par byed do //
translated: In this way, one’s mind becomes clear and one’s mindfulness becomes workable, and one will be able to focus on the absence of harm.

original: gzhan yang / dran pa dang 'brel pa bcu gnyis pa dran par byed de /
analyzed: gzhan yang / dran pa dang 'brel pa bcu gnyis pa dran par byed de /
translated: “ ‘There is another twelfth point related to mindfulness:

original: rtag tu dam pa'i chos nyan pa lhur len par byed do //
analyzed: rtag tu dam pa'i chos nyan pa lhur len par byed do //
translated: One always focuses on listening to the sacred Dharma.

original: de lhur @385b len pa dang ldan pa des chos 'dzin par byed pa gang yin pa de dag phyir zhing dam du 'dzin par byed do //
analyzed: de lhur @385b len pa dang ldan pa des chos 'dzin par byed pa gang yin pa de dag phyir zhing dam du 'dzin par byed do //
translated: He who is intent on this, and who upholds the Dharma, will be bound by the fetters of the Dharma.

original: kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / kha na mtho ba med pa'i chos rnams rnam par shes par byed de /
analyzed: kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / kha na mtho ba med pa'i chos rnams rnam par shes par byed de /
translated: He will know the Dharma that is reprehensible and the Dharma that is irreproachable.

original: de mar mes mu na nag gi gzugs dag mthong ba ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i chos kyi sgron mas kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa dag mthong ngo //
analyzed: de mar mes mu na nag gi gzugs dag mthong ba ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i chos kyi sgron mas kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa dag mthong ngo //
translated: Just as one sees black forms with a burning lamp, so with the lamp of the Dharma taught by the Blessed One, one sees what is reprehensible and what is irreproachable.

original: de ltar shin tu mnyam par bzhag pa'i dran pa 'byung ba de ni nyon mongs pa'i dra ba'i dbang du mi 'gro zhing bdud kyi dbang du mi 'gro ste /
analyzed: de ltar shin tu mnyam par bzhag pa'i dran pa 'byung ba de ni nyon mongs pa'i dra ba'i dbang du mi 'gro zhing bdud kyi dbang du mi 'gro ste /
translated: Thus, the arising of mindfulness, which is well-equipoised, does not come under the power of the net of afflictions, nor does it come under the power of Māra.

original: de ltar dran pa dang 'brel ba bcu gnyis pa'ang dran par byed do //
analyzed: de ltar dran pa dang 'brel ba bcu gnyis pa'ang dran par byed do //
translated: Thus, one should be mindful of the twelvefold connection with mindfulness.

original: gzhan yang / dran pa dang 'brel pa bcu gsum pa dran par byed de /
analyzed: gzhan yang / dran pa dang 'brel pa bcu gsum pa dran par byed de /
translated: Moreover, one should be mindful of the thirteenth connection with mindfulness.

original: skad cig skad cig la lus dang / sems dang / tshor ba'i rang gi mtshan nyid sgrub pa'i dran pa 'byung ste /
analyzed: skad cig skad cig la lus dang / sems dang / tshor ba'i rang gi mtshan nyid sgrub pa'i dran pa 'byung ste /
translated: At every moment, mindfulness arises to establish the intrinsic identity of the body, mind, and feelings.

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa 'di dag so sor shes par byed cing yid la'ang dam du 'dzin par byed do //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa 'di dag so sor shes par byed cing yid la'ang dam du 'dzin par byed do //
translated: One should understand these four establishments of mindfulness individually and hold them firmly in mind.

original: yid la byas pa de rnams kyang bag med pa sten par mi 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: yid la byas pa de rnams kyang bag med pa sten par mi 'gyur zhing /
translated: One should not rely on heedlessness with regard to those mental attentions.

original: bag yod pa la sten par byed pa de ni gshin rje'i mi'i dbang du 'gro bar mi 'gyur la rang dbang du 'gyur /
analyzed: bag yod pa la sten par byed pa de ni gshin rje'i mi'i dbang du 'gro bar mi 'gyur la rang dbang du 'gyur /
translated: One who relies on heedfulness will not fall under the sway of the Lord of Death, but will be independent.

original: dran pa nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang / dus ma yin pa la spyod par mi 'gyur ba dang / yul ma yin par spyod bar mi 'gyur ba dang / spyod yul ma yin par spyod par mi 'gyur te /🔽'brel pa 'di dag ni dran pa @386a *//
analyzed: dran pa nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang / dus ma yin pa la spyod par mi 'gyur ba dang / yul ma yin par spyod bar mi 'gyur ba dang / spyod yul ma yin par spyod par mi 'gyur te / 'brel pa 'di dag ni dran pa @386a *//
translated: One will not lose mindfulness, will not engage in untimely conduct, will not engage in improper conduct, and will not engage in conduct that is not a proper sphere of activity.

original: thams cad kyi nang du 'brel ba yin no //
analyzed: thams cad kyi nang du 'brel ba yin no //
translated: These are the connections with all forms of mindfulness.

original: gzhan yang / sems kyi khams bcu bzhi bsgom par bya zhes gang smras pa /
analyzed: gzhan yang / sems kyi khams bcu bzhi bsgom par bya zhes gang smras pa /
translated: Furthermore, as for what was said about cultivating the fourteen mental constituents,

original: legs par bsgom na shin tu spyang ba byas shing shin tu dul /
analyzed: legs par bsgom na shin tu spyang ba byas shing shin tu dul /
translated: If you meditate well, you will be very intelligent and very disciplined.

original: shin tu dag par 'gyur la /
analyzed: shin tu dag par 'gyur la /
translated: You will become very pure.

original: bag med pas phrogs par yang mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bag med pas phrogs par yang mi 'gyur ro //
translated: You will not be carried away by carelessness.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are as follows:

original: mos pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / rab tu zhi ba dang / slob dpon la bsnyen bkur ba dang / sdig pa'i grogs po yongs su spangs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi gsung la goms pa dang / tshul bzhin yid la byed pa la goms pa dang /
analyzed: mos pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / rab tu zhi ba dang / slob dpon la bsnyen bkur ba dang / sdig pa'i grogs po yongs su spangs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi gsung la goms pa dang / tshul bzhin yid la byed pa la goms pa dang /
translated: Interest, effort, peace, serving the teacher, avoiding bad friends, being familiar with the Buddha’s teachings, being familiar with proper mental activity,

original: rgod pa yongs su spangs pa dang / chos dang / chos ma yin pa'i rgyu dang / 'bras bu la dad pa dang / sngon gyi 'dod pa brjed pa dang / bung med la lta ba yongs su spangs pa dang / gnyen la lta zhing lhag par spyod pa med pa dang /
analyzed: rgod pa yongs su spangs pa dang / chos dang / chos ma yin pa'i rgyu dang / 'bras bu la dad pa dang / sngon gyi 'dod pa brjed pa dang / bung med la lta ba yongs su spangs pa dang / gnyen la lta zhing lhag par spyod pa med pa dang /
translated: avoiding agitation, having faith in the causes and effects of Dharma and non-Dharma, forgetting past desires, avoiding the view of nihilism, not being attached to relatives,

original: yul thams cad yang dag par bzung ba dang / skye ba dang / 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa yin te /
analyzed: yul thams cad yang dag par bzung ba dang / skye ba dang / 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa yin te /
translated: not being attached to all objects, and being afraid of birth and death.

original: bcu bzhi po 'di rnams kyis sems yongs su bsgoms pa de ni shin tu yongs su bsgoms pa yin la /
analyzed: bcu bzhi po 'di rnams kyis sems yongs su bsgoms pa de ni shin tu yongs su bsgoms pa yin la /
translated: These fourteen are the thorough cultivation of the mind.

original: rgyu 'di rnams kyis shin tu yongs su sbyang ba byas pa ni 'chi ba'i tshe 'gro ba ngan pa'i pho nya mi 'byung la /
analyzed: rgyu 'di rnams kyis shin tu yongs su sbyang ba byas pa ni 'chi ba'i tshe 'gro ba ngan pa'i pho nya mi 'byung la /
translated: Through these causes, one who has thoroughly purified the mind will not be visited by the messengers of the lower realms at the time of death.

original: ngan song gi sgo'ang 'bye bar mi 'gyur /
analyzed: ngan song gi sgo'ang 'bye bar mi 'gyur /
translated: The doors to the lower realms will not open.

original: dam pa'i chos la blun par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: dam pa'i chos la blun par mi 'gyur /
translated: One will not be stupid with regard to the holy Dharma.

original: mi mgul du thag pas bcings pa ltar gang dga' mgur 'gro ba @386b rgyu ba rnams su khrid par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: mi mgul du thag pas bcings pa ltar gang dga' mgur 'gro ba @386b rgyu ba rnams su khrid par mi 'gyur /
translated: One will not be led to the places one wants to go, like a bird tied to a string.

original: mi ngan pa yid ches pa'i bya ma rta lta bu'i las byed par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mi ngan pa yid ches pa'i bya ma rta lta bu'i las byed par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: One will not do the work of a bad person who is trusted like a bird who is given food.

original: 'di dag thams cad ni dam pa'i chos thob pa na /
analyzed: 'di dag thams cad ni dam pa'i chos thob pa na /
translated: All of these are the benefits of attaining the holy Dharma.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are as follows:

original: sems shin tu dul zhing shin tu sbyang pa byas la /
analyzed: sems shin tu dul zhing shin tu sbyang pa byas la /
translated: The mind is very disciplined, very purified, and very perfected.

original: shin tu mthar phyin pa ni lha dang / mi rnams kyi nang du khrid par byed do //
analyzed: shin tu mthar phyin pa ni lha dang / mi rnams kyi nang du khrid par byed do //
translated: It leads to the realms of gods and humans.

original: phyis kyang mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer gyi sgo 'byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phyis kyang mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer gyi sgo 'byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: Later, it will open the door to the city of nirvana.

original: de lta bas na gtso bo 'di dag la sems yongs su sbyang ba byas pa de ni shin tu sbyang ba byas pa yin te /
analyzed: de lta bas na gtso bo 'di dag la sems yongs su sbyang ba byas pa de ni shin tu sbyang ba byas pa yin te /
translated: Thus, one who has thoroughly purified the mind with regard to these principal matters has done a great deal.

original: gshin rje'i mi'i dbang du 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gshin rje'i mi'i dbang du 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: One will not fall under the power of the Lord of Death.

original: yang brgya byin de ngan song gi 'jigs pas nyen cing gshin rje'i mi mthong bas nyam thag pa'i lha rnams la chos ston par byed do //
analyzed: yang brgya byin de ngan song gi 'jigs pas nyen cing gshin rje'i mi mthong bas nyam thag pa'i lha rnams la chos ston par byed do //
translated: Moreover, Śakra teaches the Dharma to the gods who are frightened by the terrors of the lower realms and who are terrified by the sight of the Lord of Death’s men.

original: 'di ltar bdag gis khyed cag la chos gcig nas bzung ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar bdag gis khyed cag la chos gcig nas bzung ste /
translated: “I have taught you the Dharma in stages, beginning with one,

original: rim pa re re las bcu bzhi'i bar du chos bstan pa rim pa de la bab ste dngos po bco lnga bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: rim pa re re las bcu bzhi'i bar du chos bstan pa rim pa de la bab ste dngos po bco lnga bshad par bya'o //
translated: up to fourteen. Now, in the same way, I will teach you the fifteenth matter.

original: bcom ldan 'das las bdag gis ji ltar thos pa de ltar khyed cag la'ang bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das las bdag gis ji ltar thos pa de ltar khyed cag la'ang bshad par bya'o //
translated: I will teach you the Dharma as I have heard it from the Blessed One.

original: dngos po bco lnga gang zhe na /
analyzed: dngos po bco lnga gang zhe na /
translated: What is the fifteenth matter?

original: khyim gyi gnas nas byung nas dge sbyong du dam bcas pas spang bar bya zhing dam par bya ba dang / gzhan byed pa'ang phyir bzlog par bya ba gang yin pa de dag yin no //
analyzed: khyim gyi gnas nas byung nas dge sbyong du dam bcas pas spang bar bya zhing dam par bya ba dang / gzhan byed pa'ang phyir bzlog par bya ba gang yin pa de dag yin no //
translated: “Having gone forth from the home life, I have taken up the religious practice of a monk. I should give up and reject those things that should be given up and rejected, and I should turn away from those things that should be turned away from.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: “What are those things?

original: dang po kho nar dngos po gos dur smrig nyid yongs su shes par bya ste /🔽gang rgyags pa @387a *//
analyzed: dang po kho nar dngos po gos dur smrig nyid yongs su shes par bya ste / gang rgyags pa @387a *//
translated: First of all, I should understand the matter of the saffron-colored robe.🔽I should not wear a saffron-colored robe that would cause me to become arrogant

original: yang dag par skyed par mi byed pa'i gos dur smrig gi rnam pa de lta bu bgo bar bya'o //
analyzed: yang dag par skyed par mi byed pa'i gos dur smrig gi rnam pa de lta bu bgo bar bya'o //
translated: and conceited.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽gos dur smrig gi rgyags pas myos pa ni lus bong ltar spyod cing 'gro ba 'byed par byed pa yin la /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / gos dur smrig gi rgyags pas myos pa ni lus bong ltar spyod cing 'gro ba 'byed par byed pa yin la /
translated: Why is that?

original: rgyags pa'i lus de sgeg ba lhur len par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rgyags pa'i lus de sgeg ba lhur len par 'gyur ro //
translated: If I were to become intoxicated with the arrogance of wearing a saffron-colored robe, I would walk around with a strutting gait, and I would divide the community.

original: de ni dge ba'i chos sgrub par mi byed la /🔽bud med la lta ba lhur len par byed do //
analyzed: de ni dge ba'i chos sgrub par mi byed la / bud med la lta ba lhur len par byed do //
translated: I would become conceited and would not practice wholesome things.🔽I would become intent on looking at women.

original: de rgod pa la 'jug par byed de /
analyzed: de rgod pa la 'jug par byed de /
translated: I would become intent on laughing and playing.🔽“

original: de ltar sems yang ba gzhan gang yin pa de'ang gos kyis rgyags par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar sems yang ba gzhan gang yin pa de'ang gos kyis rgyags par 'gyur ro //
translated: In the same way, whatever other light clothing there is, that too will become a burden.

original: de lta bas na bgo bar bya ba de ni gang gis dro ba dang / grang ba'i 'jigs par mi 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: de lta bas na bgo bar bya ba de ni gang gis dro ba dang / grang ba'i 'jigs par mi 'gyur zhing /
translated: Therefore, you should wear just enough to protect against cold and heat,🔽and to cover the body.

original: gang gis lus g-yog pa tsam du gyis shig dang / de ni bag med pa'i 'gro ba'i dbang du mi 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: gang gis lus g-yog pa tsam du gyis shig dang / de ni bag med pa'i 'gro ba'i dbang du mi 'gyur zhing /
translated: In this way, you will not fall under the power of carelessness,

original: 'chi ba'i dus na'ang 'gyod pa yod par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'chi ba'i dus na'ang 'gyod pa yod par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: and at the time of death, you will not have regrets.

original: dngos po yongs su shes par bya ba'i 'di ni yongs su shes par bya ba dang po yin no //
analyzed: dngos po yongs su shes par bya ba'i 'di ni yongs su shes par bya ba dang po yin no //
translated: This is the first thing to be understood about the knowledge of things.

original: gzhan yang / dngos po gang yongs su shes par bya ba gnyis pa ni dge sbyong chog shes par gnas pas shes par bya ba yin te /
analyzed: gzhan yang / dngos po gang yongs su shes par bya ba gnyis pa ni dge sbyong chog shes par gnas pas shes par bya ba yin te /
translated: “Moreover, the second thing to be understood about the knowledge of things is this: A renunciate who is content should understand

original: bdag shes pa'am /🔽rab tu byung ba gang gis tshul khrims dang ldan par 'gyur snyam nas /
analyzed: bdag shes pa'am /🔽rab tu byung ba gang gis tshul khrims dang ldan par 'gyur snyam nas /
translated: ‘I am wise’🔽or ‘I am a renunciate.’

original: de'i rjes su 'jug par byed la sbyin pa dag dang / sbyin pa po las ma la ston dang / na ba'i gsos sman gyi rkyen gyi yo byad dang / de dang mthun pa dang / de dang 'dra ba @387b dag len par mi byed pa de ni /
analyzed: de'i rjes su 'jug par byed la sbyin pa dag dang / sbyin pa po las ma la ston dang / na ba'i gsos sman gyi rkyen gyi yo byad dang / de dang mthun pa dang / de dang 'dra ba @387b dag len par mi byed pa de ni /
translated: After that, he does not accept gifts, or donors, or the conditions of medicine for the sick, or what is suitable, or what is similar.

original: de ltar bar chad 'byung bar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: de ltar bar chad 'byung bar mi 'gyur te /
translated: Thus, he does not encounter obstacles.

original: 'di ni yongs su shes par bya ba'i dngos po gnyis pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni yongs su shes par bya ba'i dngos po gnyis pa yin no //
translated: This is the second thing to be known.

original: gzhan yang yongs su shes par bya ba'i dngos po gsum pa ni de'i chags pas mal stan yid la mi bya ba dang / dgon pa dang / tshal de dag na gnas pa btang nas /🔽gang du yon tan dang ldan par 'gyur ba ma yin pa bsod snyoms sam /
analyzed: gzhan yang yongs su shes par bya ba'i dngos po gsum pa ni de'i chags pas mal stan yid la mi bya ba dang / dgon pa dang / tshal de dag na gnas pa btang nas / gang du yon tan dang ldan par 'gyur ba ma yin pa bsod snyoms sam /
translated: “Moreover, the third thing to be known is that, due to his attachment, he does not pay attention to his bed and seat, and he abandons living in the forest and in the wilderness.

original: thug pa mang po sbyin pa de dag 'dod pas grong gi nang ngam /
analyzed: thug pa mang po sbyin pa de dag 'dod pas grong gi nang ngam /
translated: He desires to receive alms or abundant food, but not where he can develop good qualities.🔽He desires to live in a village or town.

original: grong khyer gyi nang du gnas pa de ni de'i bar chad chen po 'byung la /
analyzed: grong khyer gyi nang du gnas pa de ni de'i bar chad chen po 'byung la /
translated: That is a great obstacle for him.

original: dge ba'i chos mi sgrub pa de dang / chog mi shes pa de dang yang dag ldan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dge ba'i chos mi sgrub pa de dang / chog mi shes pa de dang yang dag ldan par 'gyur ro //
translated: They will be endowed with the practice of virtue and the practice of contentment.

original: dge sbyong gi mchog ni 'di yin te /🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: dge sbyong gi mchog ni 'di yin te / 'di lta ste /
translated: The supreme of all spiritual practitioners is

original: chog shes pa dang / bag yod pa'o //
analyzed: chog shes pa dang / bag yod pa'o //
translated: one who is content and conscientious.

original: chog mi shes pa de dag nyid la dga' ba gang yin pa de ni bslus par 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: chog mi shes pa de dag nyid la dga' ba gang yin pa de ni bslus par 'gyur zhing /

original: mi ngan pa dag la bar chad 'byung ste /
analyzed: mi ngan pa dag la bar chad 'byung ste /
translated: They will encounter obstacles from evil people

original: ngan skyugs za ba dang mtshungs so ////
analyzed: ngan skyugs za ba dang mtshungs so ////
translated: and be like those who eat vomit.

original: 'phags pa dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa /
analyzed: 'phags pa dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa /
translated: The Noble Dhāraṇī of the Application of Mindfulness of the True Dharma

original: bam po bzhi bcu gnyis pa /
analyzed: bam po bzhi bcu gnyis pa /
translated: Fascicle Forty-Two

original: de nas gzhan yang /
analyzed: de nas gzhan yang /
translated: Next,

analyzed: dngos po bzhi pa yongs su shes par bya ste /
translated: the fourth topic should be understood.

original: de yang gang zhe na /
analyzed: de yang gang zhe na /
translated: What is that?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is as follows:

original: kha ton rab tu shes la /
analyzed: kha ton rab tu shes la /
translated: One who knows recitation

analyzed: kha ton 'don pa dang / yang dag par ldan pa shes pa de tsam gyis chog ste lhag par mi bslab bo //
translated: and is endowed with recitation knowledge is content with just that and does not train further.

original: bdag gis lhag par so sor shes na /
analyzed: bdag gis lhag par so sor shes na /
translated: If I understand this correctly,

original: sbyin bdag dang / sbyin pa po dag gis @388a *//
analyzed: sbyin bdag dang / sbyin pa po dag gis @388a *//
translated: the donors

original: rna lam du thos pa yin no snyam nas /
analyzed: rna lam du thos pa yin no snyam nas /
translated: will think, ‘He is sick,’ and

analyzed: na ba'i gsos sman rkyen gyi yo byad rnams bdag la sbyin par byed do //
translated: will give him medicine and provisions for his recovery.
